snippet: Israeli military aircraft carried out multiple airstrikes in the Gaza Strip early Friday, the Israeli military and Palestinian officials said, after militants fired four rockets into southern Israel late Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Israeli military aircraft carried out multiple airstrikes in the Gaza Strip early Friday, the Israeli military and Palestinian officials said, after militants fired four rockets into southern Israel late Thursday.

headline.main: Israel: Airstrikes in Gaza Follow Militants’ Rocket Attacks
headline.print_headline: Israel: Airstrikes in Gaza Follow Militants’ Rocket Attacks
